dmca.title: RE:  Unauthorized Public Performance of Copyrighted Motion Pictures MPA Case Name
dmca.body:
Scott Kurland
Flashdust, Inc.
<http://www.dvdstreamer.com/>http://www.dvdstreamer.com
954-614-8099 (cell)
<mailto:scott@flashdust.com>scott@flashdust.com
 

Motion Picture Association of America, Inc.
United States Anti-Piracy Operations
15503 Ventura Boulevard
Encino, California  91436
Phone: (818) 728 - 8127

Email: MPAA@copyright.org <mailto:MPAA@copyright.org>mailto:MPAA@copyright.org
 

Friday, April 16, 2004

Via Fax/Email
 

RE:  Unauthorized Public Performance of Copyrighted Motion Pictures MPA Case Name: dvdstreamer.com 

Date of Infringement: 2004-04-16 12:08:50 GMT 

Dear FlashDust, Inc.: 

The Motion Picture Association of America (MPAA) represents the following motion picture production and distribution companies:

Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc.
Disney Enterprises, Inc.
Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Studios Inc.
Paramount Pictures Corporation
TriStar Pictures, Inc.
Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation
United Artists Pictures, Inc.
United Artists Corporation
Universal City Studios, LLLP
Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc.
 
We have received information that you are unlawfully offering product at locations including, but not limited to:

<http://www.dvdstreamer.com/newsite/browse.cfm?type=alpha>http://www.dvdstreamer.com/newsite/browse.cfm?type=alpha [69.64.160.96] <http://www.flashdust.com/newsite/streamer.cfm?title=264&disc=1&link=>http://www.flashdust.com/newsite/streamer.cfm?title=264&disc=1&link=
[69.64.160.86]
<http://www.flashdust.com/newsite/dvdstreamer.swf?username=&password=&title=264&disc=1&bookmark=0&link=&rand=84427>http://www.flashdust.com/newsite/dvdstreamer.swf?username=&password=&title=264&disc=1&bookmark=0&link=&rand=84427
[69.64.160.86]
<http://www.flashdust.com/newsite/streamer.cfm?title=276&disc=1&link=>http://www.flashdust.com/newsite/streamer.cfm?title=276&disc=1&link=
[69.64.160.86]
<http://www.flashdust.com/newsite/dvdstreamer.swf?username=&password=&title=276&disc=1&bookmark=0&link=&rand=17578>http://www.flashdust.com/newsite/dvdstreamer.swf?username=&password=&title=276&disc=1&bookmark=0&link=&rand=17578
[69.64.160.86]
<FlashDust DVDStramer Server> [69.64.160.123]

We have notified your ISP of the unlawful nature of these web sites and have asked for their immediate removal.

Please contact us at the above listed address or by replying to this email if you should have any questions.

 

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.
 
Respectfully,
 

Thomas Temple
Director
Worldwide Internet Enforcement
